title: This wedding is a social event guys lmao
selftext: Lol atleast they stopped calling it a public event after the outrage
comments: Ambanis are royalty of modern India

**VIPs peoples are attending** - Not my problem bitchbag. 3 days of unbearable traffic right near where I live. 

I'm leaving this year, and so should you!! To a place where personal rights are respected.
Apna PM ka malik aa raha hai, jam toh hoega hi
This should be a national holiday so people can celebrate at home.
Is this fake? What happened to the grammar of the notice? Peoples are coming???
